Package org.mt4j.util.math

Class Summary
BezierVertex The Class BezierVertex.
ConvexityUtil Class to check whether a series of vectors which belong to a polygon are convex or concave.
ConvexQuickHull2D The Class ConvexQuickHull2D.
Matrix Matrix defines and maintains a 4x4 matrix in row major order.
Plane The Class Plane.
Quaternion Quaternion defines a single example of a more general class of hypercomplex numbers.
Ray The Class Ray.
Tools3D Class containing mostly static convenience utility methods.
ToolsBuffers Methods to build Buffers for use with vertex/texture/color arrays in opengl Some methods are adapted from the JME.
ToolsGeometry A collection of geometry related static helper methods.
ToolsLight The Class ToolsLight.
ToolsMath This class provides 'fast' math approximations and float equivalents of Math functions.
ToolsVBO Methods to build VBOs and get their binding names (Ids).
Vector3D ************************************************ Homogenous 3D vector class with 4 components, X, Y, Z and W.
Vertex A point in space for describing geometry.
